channel.title: Anyone Notice?
channel.description: That you can click on text wile playing. So instead of using backspace to get to the letter you can click.

item.title: Anyone Notice?
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:24, topic:303350”]http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/deployment/applet/security.html

It seems unsigned applets can only access the system clipboard if started using JNLP. Maybe Jagex is going to force the unsigned client to be loaded using JNLP.[/quote]i dont know much about the jnlp api since ive never used it, but after looking at this, it seems to be that it forces you to allow the applet to access the user’s files, etc

so too it will be with jagex if they decide to implement this method. i doubt they will ban people for refusing to grant them access to your system’s clipboard

by the way, has anyone even seen that the client actually sends the clipboard’s contents to the server?

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone Notice?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

you could filter bad words out of the clipboard, override the clipboard method.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone Notice?
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:28, topic:303350”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=399671.msg3006357#msg3006357 date=1256437497]
Clipboard access (or lack thereof) doesn’t really have anything to do with cheating…What possible grounds could they ban you on? ;
[/quote]

The don’t need grounds to ban people, they don’t supply any either when banning.[/quote]
Yes but what would motivate them to expend the effort to ban people who don’t want Jagex seeing their clipboard?

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone Notice?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Unhandled:

Clipboard access (or lack thereof) doesn’t really have anything to do with cheating…What possible grounds could they ban you on? ;\

The don’t need grounds to ban people, they don’t supply any either when banning.

item.title: Anyone Notice?
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:19, topic:303350”][quote author=abraham2119 link=topic=399671.msg3006278#msg3006278 date=1256431114]

What does it do if SecurityManager.checkSystemClipboardAccess() throws a SecurityException?
[/quote]then they wont be able to access clipboard, so copy and paste wont be available when running unsigned client

Yeah but what if you wrote your own SecurityManager and ran it it signed mode?[/quote]i havent looked, but im pretty sure the client checks to see whether it has enough permission before actually attempting to access the clipboard

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone Notice?
item.dc:creator: @BAsh BAsh
item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:20, topic:303350”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=399671.msg3006281#msg3006281 date=1256431218]

[quote author=abraham2119 link=topic=399671.msg3006278#msg3006278 date=1256431114]

What does it do if SecurityManager.checkSystemClipboardAccess() throws a SecurityException?
[/quote]then they wont be able to access clipboard, so copy and paste wont be available when running unsigned client

Yeah but what if you wrote your own SecurityManager and ran it it signed mode?
[/quote]Possible ban? I suppose there would be a few scenarios where that could happen though.[/quote]
Or just hook the call to the clipboard. If it contains anything untoward then return an empty clipboard. Or just return an empty clipboard anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone Notice?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:

Good, that would only be around 5 years too late.

item.title: Anyone Notice?
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled

Clipboard access (or lack thereof) doesn’t really have anything to do with cheating…What possible grounds could they ban you on? ;\

item.title: Anyone Notice?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:20, topic:303350”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=399671.msg3006281#msg3006281 date=1256431218]

[quote author=abraham2119 link=topic=399671.msg3006278#msg3006278 date=1256431114]

What does it do if SecurityManager.checkSystemClipboardAccess() throws a SecurityException?
[/quote]then they wont be able to access clipboard, so copy and paste wont be available when running unsigned client

Yeah but what if you wrote your own SecurityManager and ran it it signed mode?
[/quote]Possible ban? I suppose there would be a few scenarios where that could happen though.[/quote]
It’s an interesting question in any case, and one that frank_ and I were speaking about not so long ago.
Is it really so hard to believe that some people may play Runescape in a secure environment? Would an ethics-bound company really presume that, just because the security policy is tight, the player is cheating?

Read full topic
